description: Behaviors for creating role-playing game mechanics, character progression, and RPG systems

campfire.name: Campfire
campfire.description: A deployable campfire system with realistic fire mechanics. Features stow/deploy functionality, resource requirements, heat effects, lighting, particle effects, and health restoration. Perfect for creating survival mechanics, rest areas, and atmospheric lighting in RPG games.

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the campfire

properties.name: PICKUP_TEXT
properties.default: Press PGUP to pack up the campfire
properties.description: Text displayed when picking up the campfire

properties.name: DEPLOY_TEXT
properties.default: Press PGDN to deploy the campfire
properties.description: Text displayed when deploying the campfire

properties.name: USE_TEXT
properties.default: Press E to start or Q to put-out campfire
properties.description: Text displayed when using the campfire

properties.name: RESOURCE_REQUIRED
properties.description: Resource item required to light the campfire (e.g., 'Wood')

properties.name: HEAT_RANGE
properties.description: Range at which the campfire provides heat effects

properties.name: HEAT_DELAY
properties.description: Seconds between heat effect applications

properties.name: PARTICLE_NAME
properties.description: Name of particle effect object (e.g., 'Particle1')

properties.name: LIGHT_NAME
properties.description: Name of light object (e.g., 'Light1')

properties.name: GLOW_EFFECT
properties.description: Whether to enable emissive glow effect

properties.name: IS_DEPLOYED
properties.description: Whether campfire starts deployed or carried

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of user global variable to affect (e.g., 'MyBodyTemp')

properties.name: AFFECT_TYPE
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the global variable

properties.name: AFFECT_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount to affect the global variable per heat delay

properties.name: AFFECT_HEALTH
properties.description: Whether to affect player health by affect amount

properties.name: BURN_LIFE
properties.description: Seconds the campfire burns (0 = continuous)

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display prompt text

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the campfire object

steps: Configure interaction range and text prompts
Set up resource requirements if needed
Configure heat range and delay settings
Set up particle and light object names
Set up health effects if needed
Check resource consumption and burn life

chest.name: Chest
chest.description: A storage chest system that opens to display an inventory screen. Features customizable containers, HUD screen integration, animation support, and persistent storage. Perfect for creating loot containers, storage systems, and inventory management in RPG games.

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the chest

properties.name: USE_PROMPT
properties.description: Text displayed in the interaction prompt

properties.name: CHEST_SCREEN
properties.description: Name of the HUD screen to display when chest is opened

properties.name: CHEST_CONTAINER
properties.description: Name of the container for storing items (unique per chest if 'chestunique')

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display the prompt text

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the chest object

steps: Configure interaction range and prompt text
Set up HUD screen name for inventory display
Configure container name for item storage

chest_portable.name: Chest Portable
chest_portable.description: A portable chest that can be picked up and carried by the player. Features automatic and manual pickup styles, customizable access keys, HUD screen integration, and persistent storage. Perfect for creating portable storage solutions, backpack systems, and mobile inventory management in RPG games.

properties.name: PICKUP_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when picking up the portable chest

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can pick up the chest

properties.name: PICKUP_STYLE
properties.description: Whether chest is picked up automatically or requires key press

properties.name: USEAGE_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when chest is in inventory

properties.name: USEAGE_KEY
properties.description: Key to press to access the portable chest

properties.name: CHEST_SCREEN
properties.description: Name of the HUD screen to display when chest is accessed

properties.name: CHEST_CONTAINER
properties.description: Name of the container for storing items

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display the prompt text

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the chest object

steps: Set up pickup style (automatic or manual)
Configure access key and usage text
Set up HUD screen name for inventory display
Configure container name for item storage

compass.name: Compass
compass.description: A navigation compass system with digital and magnetic display modes. Features pickup mechanics, toggle controls, customizable positioning, and real-time directional display. Perfect for creating navigation aids, exploration tools, and directional guidance in RPG games.

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can pick up the compass

properties.name: PICKUP_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when picking up the compass

properties.name: COMPASS_TYPE
properties.description: Type of compass display (Digital = text-based, Magnetic = image-based)

properties.name: COMPASS_MODE
properties.description: Whether compass requires pickup or is always available

properties.name: POSITION_X
properties.description: X position of the compass on screen

properties.name: POSITION_Y
properties.description: Y position of the compass on screen

properties.name: RADIAL_SIZE
properties.description: Size of the magnetic compass display

properties.name: BASE_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the base compass image file

properties.name: SPIN_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the spinning compass needle image file

properties.name: TOP_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the top compass overlay image file

steps: Set up compass type (digital or magnetic)
Configure compass mode (pickup or always on)
Set screen position for compass display
Configure radial size for magnetic compass
Set up image file paths for magnetic mode

area_damage_spell.name: Area Damage Spell
area_damage_spell.description: A collectible spell that creates an area damage effect when cast, damaging all enemies within a radius around the player. Features mana cost system, level requirements, particle effects, and visual scaling animation. Perfect for creating offensive magic spells in RPG games.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.default: E to collect Area Damage Spell
properties.description: Text displayed when collecting the spell

properties.name: USEAGE_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the spell is successfully cast

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can collect the spell

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the global variable for mana (e.g., 'MyMana')

properties.name: MANA_COST
properties.description: Amount of mana required to cast the spell

properties.name: CAST_DAMAGE
properties.description: Amount of damage dealt to enemies in the area

properties.name: CAST_RADIUS
properties.description: Radius of the area damage effect

properties.name: PLAYER_LEVEL
properties.description: Minimum player level required to cast the spell

properties.name: PARTICLE1_NAME
properties.description: Name of first particle effect object (e.g., 'SpellParticle1')

properties.name: PARTICLE2_NAME
properties.description: Name of second particle effect object (e.g., 'SpellParticle2')

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the spell object

steps: Configure pickup range and prompt text
Set up mana cost and global variable
Set player level requirement if needed
Add particle effect objects if desired
Set up sound effects (Sound0 for success, Sound1 for failure)
Verify area damage and particle effects
Check mana consumption and level requirements

direct_damage_spell.name: Direct Damage Spell
direct_damage_spell.description: A collectible spell that deals direct damage to a targeted enemy with splash damage to nearby enemies. Features targeting system (T key or right-click), mana cost, level requirements, and particle effects. Perfect for creating single-target offensive magic in RPG games.

properties.description: Amount of mana required to cast the spell

properties.description: Radius of splash damage effect around the target

Verify direct damage and splash effects
Check mana consumption and level requirements

crafting_kit.description: A portable crafting kit that allows players to access a crafting interface from anywhere. Features multiple pickup styles, customizable access keys, HUD screen integration, and persistent crafting container. properties.description: Where to display prompt text

properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the recipe object

steps: Set up collection text and quantity

root_spell.name: Root Spell
root_spell.description: A collectible root spell that immobilizes a targeted enemy for a duration while dealing damage over time. Features targeting system (T key or right-click), mana cost, level requirements, particle effects, and speed modulation. Perfect for creating crowd control magic in RPG games.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when collecting the root spell

properties.name: USEAGE_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the spell is successfully cast

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can collect the spell

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the global variable for mana (e.g., 'MyMana')

properties.name: MANA_COST
properties.description: Amount of mana required to cast the spell

properties.name: CAST_DAMAGE
properties.description: Amount of damage dealt to the targeted enemy over time

properties.name: CAST_RADIUS
properties.description: Radius of the root effect area

properties.name: PLAYER_LEVEL
properties.description: Minimum player level required to cast the spell

properties.name: PARTICLE1_NAME
properties.description: Name of first particle effect object (e.g., 'SpellParticle1')

properties.name: PARTICLE2_NAME
properties.description: Name of second particle effect object (e.g., 'SpellParticle2')

steps: Configure pickup range and prompt text
Set up mana cost and global variable
Set player level requirement if needed
Add particle effect objects if desired
Set up sound effects (Sound0 for success, Sound1 for failure)
Use T key or right-click to target enemies
Left-click to cast root at targeted enemy
Verify immobilization and damage over time effects
Check mana consumption and level requirements

rpg_player_state.name: RPG Player State
rpg_player_state.description: A comprehensive player state management system that incrementally modifies up to 4 global variables over time with configurable intervals, effects, and damage thresholds. Features automatic activation, damage level monitoring, and global variable restoration on player death. Perfect for creating hunger, thirst, stamina, and other persistent player state systems in RPG games.

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED1
properties.description: Name of the first global variable to affect (e.g., 'MyHealth', 'MyHunger')

properties.name: AMOUNT1
properties.description: Amount to add or deduct from the first global variable per time interval

properties.name: TIME_INTERVAL1
properties.description: Time interval in seconds for the first global variable effect (0 = disabled)

properties.name: EFFECT1
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the first global variable

properties.name: DAMAGE_LEVEL1
properties.description: Threshold level above/below which damage is applied for the first global variable

properties.name: DAMAGE_AMOUNT1
properties.description: Amount of damage to apply when first global variable exceeds damage level

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED2
properties.description: Name of the second global variable to affect (e.g., 'MyMana', 'MyThirst')

properties.name: AMOUNT2
properties.description: Amount to add or deduct from the second global variable per time interval

properties.name: TIME_INTERVAL2
properties.description: Time interval in seconds for the second global variable effect (0 = disabled)

properties.name: EFFECT2
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the second global variable

properties.name: DAMAGE_LEVEL2
properties.description: Threshold level above/below which damage is applied for the second global variable

properties.name: DAMAGE_AMOUNT2
properties.description: Amount of damage to apply when second global variable exceeds damage level

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED3
properties.description: Name of the third global variable to affect (e.g., 'MyStamina', 'MyTemperature')

properties.name: AMOUNT3
properties.description: Amount to add or deduct from the third global variable per time interval

properties.name: TIME_INTERVAL3
properties.description: Time interval in seconds for the third global variable effect (0 = disabled)

properties.name: EFFECT3
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the third global variable

properties.name: DAMAGE_LEVEL3
properties.description: Threshold level above/below which damage is applied for the third global variable

properties.name: DAMAGE_AMOUNT3
properties.description: Amount of damage to apply when third global variable exceeds damage level

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED4
properties.description: Name of the fourth global variable to affect (e.g., 'MyEnergy', 'MySanity')

properties.name: AMOUNT4
properties.description: Amount to add or deduct from the fourth global variable per time interval

properties.name: TIME_INTERVAL4
properties.description: Time interval in seconds for the fourth global variable effect (0 = disabled)

properties.name: EFFECT4
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the fourth global variable

properties.name: DAMAGE_LEVEL4
properties.description: Threshold level above/below which damage is applied for the fourth global variable

properties.name: DAMAGE_AMOUNT4
properties.description: Amount of damage to apply when fourth global variable exceeds damage level

properties.name: ActivateAtStart
properties.description: Whether to activate the system at start (Yes) or require manual activation via switch/zone (No)

features: Configurable time intervals for each variable
Add or deduct effects for each variable
Automatic damage application based on thresholds
Global variable restoration on player death

steps: Configure global variables to affect (up to 4)
Set up time intervals for each variable effect
Configure amounts to add or deduct per interval
Set up damage thresholds and amounts if needed
Verify global variable changes over time
Test player death and variable restoration

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.description: A consumable stamina item that provides stamina boost or deduction to the player. Features automatic and manual pickup styles, global variable integration, quantity management, and sound effects. Perfect for creating stamina potions, energy drinks, and consumable stamina items in RPG games.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when using the stamina item

properties.name: PROMPT_IF_COLLECTABLE
properties.description: Text displayed when collecting the stamina item

properties.name: USAGE_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the stamina effect is applied

properties.name: QUANTITY
properties.description: Amount of stamina to add or deduct from the player

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the stamina item

properties.name: PICKUP_STYLE
properties.description: Whether stamina item is consumed automatically or requires key press

properties.name: EFFECT
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct stamina from the player

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the global variable for stamina (e.g., 'MyStaminaMax')

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display prompt text

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the stamina object

steps: Configure prompt text and pickup range
Set up stamina quantity and effect type
Configure global variable for stamina tracking
Set up pickup style (automatic or manual)
Test stamina item pickup and consumption

potion.name: Potion
potion.description: A consumable potion system that provides boost or deduction to any global variable when consumed. Features automatic and manual pickup styles, global variable integration, quantity management, and sound effects. Perfect for creating health potions, mana potions, and any consumable item that affects player stats in RPG games.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when using the potion

properties.name: PROMPT_IF_COLLECTABLE
properties.description: Text displayed when collecting the potion

properties.name: USEAGE_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the potion effect is applied

properties.name: QUANTITY
properties.description: Amount to add or deduct from the global variable

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the potion

properties.name: PICKUP_STYLE
properties.description: Whether potion is consumed automatically or requires key press

properties.name: EFFECT
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the global variable

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the global variable to affect (e.g., 'MyMana', 'MyHealth', 'MyStamina')

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display prompt text

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the potion object

steps: Configure prompt text and pickup range
Set up quantity and effect type
Set up pickup style (automatic or manual)

quest_poster.name: Quest Poster
quest_poster.description: A comprehensive quest system that displays quest information and tracks multiple quest types including activate, collect, destroy, and deliver quests. Features HUD screen integration, quest progress tracking, automatic rewards, and quest completion mechanics. Perfect for creating quest boards, mission systems, and RPG progression in games.

properties.name: RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the quest poster

properties.name: QUEST_PROMPT
properties.default: Press E to view this quest
properties.description: Text displayed when the player can interact with the quest poster

properties.name: QUEST_SCREEN
properties.description: Name of the HUD screen to display when viewing quest details

properties.name: QuestChoice
properties.description: Quest number to display (0 = QuestList, 1+ = specific quest number)

features: Multiple quest types (activate, collect, destroy, deliver)

steps: Configure interaction range and prompt text
Set up HUD screen for quest display

quest_sequencer.name: Quest Sequencer
quest_sequencer.description: A sophisticated quest sequencing system that automatically progresses through a series of quests in order. Features automatic quest activation, sequential progression, quest completion tracking, and automatic rewards. Perfect for creating linear quest chains, story progression, and automated mission sequences in RPG games.

properties.name: QUEST_START_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when a quest sequence is activated

properties.name: QUEST_END_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when a quest is completed

properties.name: QUEST_READOUT
properties.description: What information to store in the readout global variable

properties.name: READOUT_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: Name of global variable to store quest information (e.g., 'MyReadout')

properties.name: QuestChoice
properties.description: Starting quest number in the sequence

properties.name: HIDE_OBJECT
properties.description: Whether to hide the sequencer object during operation

features: Multiple quest types support (activate, collect, destroy, deliver)

steps: Configure quest start and end text
Set up quest readout system if needed

resource.name: Resource
resource.description: A resource harvesting system that provides crafting resources to the player. Features automatic and manual pickup styles, quantity management, and resource collection mechanics. Perfect for creating harvestable resources, crafting materials, and collectible items in RPG games.

properties.name: PICKUP_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the player can harvest the resource

properties.name: COLLECTED_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the resource is successfully harvested

properties.name: QUANTITY
properties.description: Amount of resource to give to the player when harvested

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can harvest the resource

properties.name: PICKUP_STYLE
properties.description: Whether resource is harvested automatically or requires key press

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display prompt text

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the resource object

steps: Set object as Collectable and Resource

resource_node.name: Resource Node
resource_node.description: A sophisticated resource node system that spawns resources over time with configurable growth and extraction modes. Features automatic resource spawning, tool requirements, respawn mechanics, and resource quantity management. Perfect for creating renewable resource nodes, mining sites, and sustainable resource gathering in RPG games.

properties.name: NODE_TYPE
properties.description: Type of resource node: Growth = automatic spawning, Extraction = requires tool/weapon

properties.name: NODE_TOOL_NAME
properties.description: Specific weapon/tool required for extraction (Any = no requirement)

properties.name: NODE_RESPAWN_TIME
properties.description: Minutes before node respawns (0 = destroyed after depletion)

properties.name: NODE_RESPAWNS
properties.description: Number of times the node can respawn

properties.name: NODE_RESOURCE_QUANTITY
properties.description: Number of resources the node can spawn

properties.name: RESOURCE_SPAWN_TIME
properties.description: Minutes between resource spawns (0 = instant respawn)

properties.name: RESOURCE_SPAWN_SPREAD
properties.description: Distance spread for resource spawning

properties.name: RESOURCE_ENTITY_NAME
properties.description: Name of the resource entity to spawn

properties.name: NODE_USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the node

properties.name: NODE_USE_PROMPT
properties.description: Text displayed when the player can extract resources

properties.name: NODE_TOOL_PROMPT
properties.description: Text displayed when the player needs a specific tool

properties.name: NODE_SCALER
properties.description: Whether the node scales down as resources are extracted

properties.name: HIDE_NODE
properties.description: Whether to hide the node object during operation

steps: Set up tool requirements if needed
Set up resource spawn timing and spread
Set up interaction range and prompts
